# Introduction
As a statistician I frequently look for useful data. It might be for my research of for my teaching. Now and then I find a for me new source and I tend to forget the old one. The first part of this book is a collection of data sources.

Next part is more ambitious. There are a number of papers I think that a statistician should have read for some reason.
